page.title: 07RECREATION IN WIMBOLDSLEY
page.content: {THE VERDIN ARMS.}Children play on the apparatus, or inside the family room. They cook scampi and chips and sell drinks of tea, coffee and coca-cola. {FISHING.}Good fishing places are in the canals, the Rivers Wheelock and Weaver and in the Flashes. These are places where the ground has sunk because of the Salt Mines. {HOLIDAYS.}Of 11 families 3 went abroad , 9 in the U.K. 9 went by car , 2 towed caravans. 2 went by plane. It takes 2 hours to get to Spain, 8 hours to America. By car , 2 hours to Blackpool and 6 hours to Cornwall. It is about 200 miles to London. It takes 4 hours by car, 2 hours by train. It takes half an hour by plane from Manchester Airport.
